title: Education Check
description: Verify academic credentials, degrees, and certifications to ensure candidates have the qualifications they claim.

title: Employment Check
description: Comprehensive verification of work history, job titles, responsibilities, and employment dates.

title: Criminal Check
description: Thorough background screening to identify any criminal records or legal issues.

title: Identity Check
description: Validate identity documents and ensure the person is who they claim to be.

title: Site Visit Check
description: Physical verification of addresses, offices, and locations for complete authenticity.

title: Drug Test
description: Professional drug screening services to maintain a safe and productive workplace.

title: Global Sanctions
description: Check against international sanctions lists, PEP databases, and watchlists.

title: Reference Check
description: Contact and verify professional references to validate candidate reputation and performance.

title: Social Media Check
description: Analyze digital footprint and social media presence for reputation risk assessment.

title: Vendor Check
description: Comprehensive due diligence on vendors, suppliers, and business partners.
